name: SWACK
description:
Made at the Global Game Jam 2020 Guildford site, in the Wargaming UK studios, in a total work-time of 24hrs.

As an honourable member of the Stellar Wreckage and Calamity Knights, it is your job to rescue spaceships from impending destruction by flinging their broken bits together.

Credits: 

Programmer Wizard - Kai Salmon

Art Enchanter - Elisa Moriconi

Wordsmith - Monkey

Musical Mage - James Tocher

Sonic Sorcerer - Oliver Jewitt-Harris

Producer Shaman - Tristan Jacobs
